metadata.dc:author: Marzo López, M C
Martínez Ojeda, L
Montolio Doñate, S
Castells Rodellas, A
Ramírez Bosca, A
metadata.dc:description: A study is made of the state of cell and humoral immunity in patients with genital warts. The results show an increase in the T-suppressor lymphocyte population (T8+) (p less than 0.011) of these patients, which reduces the T-helper/T suppressor ratio (T4 +/T8 +). No alterations are observed in the humoral immunity on analyzing seric immunoglobulin concentration (IgA, IgG, IgM), complement factors (C3, C4), or their functionality (CH50).
metadata.dc:title: Estudio de parámetros inmunológicos en pacientes con condilomas acuminados.
[Immunologic parameters in patients with acuminata condylomas].
